resources.string: GSA EGYPT
Settings
GSA EGYPT
The Google Student Ambassador Program is an opportunity for students to serve as liasions between Google and their university.
These are undergraduate students of any discipline who share our passion about technology and Google.
Duties of a Student Ambassador :
Organize events to champion Google’s products and brand on campus.
Build Relationships on campus with faculty,staff and student groups.
Promote new products,campaigns,jobs and programs aimed at students.
Facilitate and support the school’s adoption and usage of Google Apps for Education.
Work with Google teams to help us better understand your campus culture.
Benfits :
Receive regular updates and training about Google products and features.
Build your resume and enhance leadership and communication skills.
Develop Relationships with Ambassadors from other schools around the world.
Gain exposure to faculty and staff across campus.
Get lots of Google swag and goodies.
Time commitment :
One academic school year.
Approximately eight hours/month.
5 events per school years.
